You just arn't feeling up for an adventure right now. Maybe later you'll check it out. Eventually you get back to your house near the river docks in Chegckle.

On your doorstep is a neatly sealed letter, with beautifully written ink spelling out your name on it. It has a large red seal with the recognizable crest of the University of Lekna on it. The return address is also from Lekna. Lekna is a large town known for its prestigous university, and for being on Roads Bay.

The inside of the letter is extremely intriguing. You've been excepted into the famous University of Lekna, and given a scholarship. The University of Lekna is a very good school and hard to get into. The fact that they would give a scholarship to a random person in Chegckle is hard to believe. The scholarship is also paying for a dorm room for the school year, and the letter comes with a train ticket to Lekna.

Ignore the inviteGo to Lekna
